name: Aladin Abugrara
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I'm a noob eeer I mean a junior web-dev, I started my journey a little more than a year ago and altho I'm taking all the tutorials, courses and whatnot out there I believe the are many issues and doubts that you can learn about only by talking with real people and learn from their experiences
what_can_i_contribute: I'm afraid that my lack of experience wont help that much, or at least programming wise, but I can help in every way possible ( picking and moving stuff around and/or helping with dunno food serving etc)
